translation.en: -[man] You look great. -[Nancy Kulik] Thank you.
translation.es: - Se ve hermosa. - Gracias. UN DOCUMENTAL ORIGINAL DE NETFLIX

translation.en: [woman] Should she hold this? Should this be somewhere else?
translation.es: ¿Debe sostener esto o va en otro lugar?

translation.en: If you want, I could just flare out the blouse.
translation.es: Si quieres, puedo abrir la blusa.

translation.en: -[man] No, no, you're perfect. -Okay.
[woman] You're miked up, Mommy.
-All right. Okay. -[woman] Let's do your hair check, okay?
translation.es: - Ya tienes el micrófono. - Bien. - A ver el cabello. - Bueno.

translation.en: -Ma, you look so beautiful sitting there. -[laughing]
Well, how did this all begin?
How did it all begin?
[Nancy] Growing up, I knew that I had a very special mother.
translation.es: Cuando era niña, sabía que tenía una madre muy especial.

translation.en: And we were raised
in a very wonderful, loving, Italian heritage background.
translation.es: en un contexto maravilloso, amoroso y de antecedentes italianos.

translation.en: I didn't have Cheerios for breakfast. I had frittata with broccolini.
translation.es: No desayunaba cereales. Comía frittata con bimi.

translation.en: I never followed the herd. Never.
translation.es: Nunca fui con la corriente. Nunca.

translation.en: It didn't occur to me to do so.
My children were always telling me what they felt I should do.
translation.es: Mis hijos siempre me decían lo que creían que debía hacer.

translation.en: "Mommy, you should run!
You should jump. You should do all kinds of exercises."
translation.es: Deberías saltar, hacer todo tipo de ejercicios".

translation.en: And I'm thinking, "Okay, I'm listening."
"And you know, Mom, don't eat all that fruit.
translation.es: "Y, mamá, no comas toda esa fruta.

translation.en: That's sugar.
And, you know,
Pumpkin seeds are so good for you."
translation.es: "Las semillas de calabaza son muy saludables".

translation.en: And then one day, I was asked,
"Why don't I try whole wheat pasta?"
translation.es: por qué no probaba la pasta de trigo integral.

translation.en: Well, that did it.
I said, "You know, I'm listening to everything you're saying.
I respect all of it.
But I ask myself,
'What would Sophia Loren do?'"
[man] You're done. Thank you.
[man 2 in Italian] Do you want to button that?
Too much cleavage?
[man] A bit.
[Sophia Loren in English] "What would Sophia Loren do?"
But why me?
Look at that smile. [clicks tongue] Look at that smile!
translation.es: Mira esa sonrisa. Mira esa sonrisa.

translation.en: So she's from Naples.
And we're from Naples on down.
That's my mom.
-[man] Nancy's parents came from Italy. -[Nancy] And my beautiful father.
translation.es: - Los padres de Nancy vinieron de Italia. - Y mi padre bello.

translation.en: In their generation in Italy,
marriages were arranged.
-That's right. -And who had a big "diary"--
translation.es: - Así es. - A quien tenía dote grande.

translation.en: -Dowry. -Dowry.
And this and that and the families
and who had a bigger area, or whatever they used to do.
translation.es: quién tenía más terreno y ese tipo de cosas.

translation.en: And my mother said, "Oh, Padre, no, no.
I pick my own."
I was born in America
three years after my parents came from Italy.
translation.es: tres años después de que mis padres llegaran de Italia.

translation.en: I'm so Italian.
I don't know of any other relative in my generations
translation.es: No conozco a ningún otro pariente de mi generación

translation.en: that were other than Italian, so I'm really steeped in it.
translation.es: que no sea italiano, así que el origen es muy puro.

translation.en: When they were gonna go see a movie,
translation.es: Cuando iban a ver una película,

translation.en: they weren't gonna go see an American movie, which they could hardly understand.
translation.es: no veían una estadounidense, que apenas podían entender.

translation.en: Not only in language, but in behavioral.
translation.es: Por el idioma y también por las conductas.

translation.en: No, they went to the Italian movies.
[Nancy] Look, look, look! Oh, my God. -She was so on target. Look at her. -[characters speaking Italian]
translation.es: Mira. Por Dios. Era muy precisa. Mírala.

translation.en: -Did you see that? -[man yells]
Oh, come on.
[chuckles] She knows how to be very, very alluring.
I'm making pizza, but-- see? [laughing]
And look at her reaction.
Yeah. That's "emozi."
-"Emozi" in Italian means the motions. -[speaking Italian on screen]
[Nancy] And when I see that, I identify it.
I don't do it, but I remember seeing it.
translation.es: No lo hago, pero recuerdo haberlo visto

translation.en: With my parents and the friends and…
translation.es: con mis padres, mis amigos y…

translation.en: that was my life as a child, a little girl and then growing up.
translation.es: Así era mi vida de niña y durante mi infancia.

translation.en: So that's one of the things that I get a big kick out of.
translation.es: Esa es una de las cosas que disfruto mucho.

translation.en: And then, of course, Sophia represented beauty.
translation.es: Y, por supuesto, Sophia representaba la belleza.

translation.en: But not like a classic beauty.
Like a Grace Kelly with, you know, the little perfect features.
translation.es: Como Grace Kelly, con sus características perfectas.

translation.en: [Nancy] She is her own type of classic beauty.
translation.es: Tiene su propio tipo de belleza clásica.

translation.en: [Nancy] And that really inspired me
because we're all different, and so many people are beautiful.
translation.es: porque todos somos diferentes. Y mucha gente es hermosa.

translation.en: Look at her walking down the street. Oh, God, she is so cute.
translation.es: Mírala caminando por la calle. Cielos, es tan linda.

translation.en: Now there's a lady.
I wouldn't mind looking like her.
translation.es: No me molestaría verme como ella.

translation.en: Because I also am endowed. [laughs]
And she-- she was not twiggy.
So I couldn't relate to those other little skinny things, you know?
translation.es: No me identificaba con las otras chicas flacas.

translation.en: When I was in my 30s, I designed the first enrichment program in the state.
translation.es: Cerca de los 35 años, diseñé el primer programa de enriquecimiento del estado.

translation.en: And I had to work with five mayors.
The one thing they had in common is that they liked the way I looked.
translation.es: Lo único que tenían en común era que les gustaba mi aspecto

translation.en: Because I made them look good.
Welcome to the Fort Lee Enrichment Program.
translation.es: Bienvenidos al Programa de Enriquecimiento de Fort Lee.

translation.en: It's an after-school, all-volunteer program,
translation.es: Es un programa extraescolar de voluntariado

translation.en: that is especially designed for the children…
And I didn't do it just for myself.
translation.es: No lo hice solo para mí.

translation.en: I did it 'cause I'd want them to say yes to me. [chuckles]
translation.es: Lo hice porque quería que me dijeran que sí.

translation.en: For the program, for the children.
translation.es: Por el programa, por los niños.

translation.en: Everything from advanced cooking to painting to photography,
translation.es: Todo, desde cocina avanzada hasta pintura y fotografía.

translation.en: there are 84 classes as we enter our fifth year.
translation.es: Hay 84 clases al comienzo de nuestro quinto año.

translation.en: Nowadays, the women would kill me for saying that.
translation.es: Hoy en día, las mujeres me matarían por decir eso.

translation.en: But they shouldn't.
Because it's not about anything other than presenting your best.
translation.es: porque solo se trataba de dar lo mejor.

translation.en: She was always making the best of what she had.
translation.es: Ella siempre hacía lo mejor que podía.

translation.en: It's hard to believe she's only 17 in that movie.
translation.es: Es difícil creer que solo tiene 17 años en esa película.

translation.en: [man] When you were young.
Why now?
-"When you were young." -[man] As I was saying that, I knew…
[man in Italian] Action!
[man 2 in English] Do you feel lucky?
-Lucky? -[man 2] Lucky. Yeah.
I mean, lucky to be who you are and also lucky that you got where you are.
translation.es: Suerte de ser quien eres y de que llegaste a donde estás.

translation.en: Well, it's not like what they write about me, about the Cinderella story, you know,
translation.es: Bueno, no es como lo que escribieron, que fui como la Cenicienta.

translation.en: "She became a wonderful actress just with a--"
translation.es: "Se convirtió en una actriz maravillosa solo con…".

translation.en: -[man 2] Magic? -Like, a fairy with a magic stick.
-[man 2] Mm-hmm. -I like when I read that. I get very romantic and very sentimental about it.
translation.es: Me gusta leer esas cosas. Me ponen muy romántica y sentimental.

translation.en: But the truth is that, um…
I think the steps of my career have been really very hard.
translation.es: es que cada paso de mi carrera ha sido muy duro.

translation.en: It was during the war. We didn't have enough money to live.
translation.es: Fue durante la guerra. No teníamos dinero para vivir.

translation.en: So we didn't have anything to eat.
My father never took care of us.
Never.
My mother didn't know what to do with herself and me and my sister.
translation.es: Mi madre no sabía qué hacer con mi hermana y conmigo.

translation.en: So my mother wanted me to be in a beauty contest in Naples.
translation.es: Se le ocurrió que participara en un concurso de belleza en Nápoles.

translation.en: And I won that contest.
And with the money I got from the contest,
translation.es: Con el dinero que me dieron del concurso

translation.en: I was able to go to Rome and start to look for work.
translation.es: pude ir a Roma y empezar a buscar trabajo.

translation.en: Vittorio De Sica, he was the one that really caught me.
translation.es: Vittorio De Sica fue quien realmente me reclutó.

translation.en: When I was 17 years old, I did The Gold of Naples with him,
translation.es: Cuando tenía 17 años, hice El oro de Nápoles con él,

translation.en: and it was a great hit.
And that put me on the map.
[Edoardo Ponti] Okay, let's start again, Mom.
Be a little more fluid with, "It's always hard to raise…"
translation.es: Sé más natural con lo de "siempre es difícil criar…".

translation.en: [in English] Okay? Camera!
[in English] Cut. Very nice. Okay. Again, straightaway.
translation.es: Corte. Muy bien. Otra vez, enseguida.

translation.en: Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
[in Italian] I have the whole take…
but this is the only look I want to focus on.
translation.es: pero este es el único ángulo en el que quiero centrarme.

translation.en: [in English] Nominated for Best Performance by an Actress
are Audrey Hepburn in Breakfast at Tiffany's.
translation.es: Audrey Hepburn, en Muñequita de lujo,

translation.en: Piper Laurie in The Hustler.
Geraldine Page in Summer and Smoke.
translation.es: Geraldine Page, en Verano y humo,

translation.en: Natalie Wood in Splendor in the Grass.
translation.es: Natalie Wood, Esplendor en la hierba…

translation.en: -Sophia Loren? -[audience laughs]
-Sophia Loren in Two Women. -[audience applauds]
I was saving it. The winner is…
translation.es: Me la estaba guardando. La ganadora es…

translation.en: You didn't attend that ceremony. Why didn't you?
translation.es: No fuiste a esa ceremonia. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Because it was the first time that they, uh…
gave the possibility of winning an award to a foreign film.
translation.es: que una película extranjera tenía la posibilidad de ganar un premio.

translation.en: So I said, "Well, if I am among the five,
translation.es: Así que pensé: "Bueno, si estoy entre las cinco,

translation.en: I'm going to be very happy, but I would never won it."
translation.es: me pondré muy contenta, pero no ganaré".

translation.en: So I stayed home.
The telephone rings.
And who is on the phone?
Saying, "Sophia, you won! Sophia, you won!"
[Nancy] In Two Women, she depicts a very strong woman,
translation.es: En Dos mujeres, interpreta a una mujer muy fuerte que, sin importar lo que pasara,

translation.en: who no matter what was happening,
translation.es: a una mujer muy fuerte que, sin importar lo que pasara,

translation.en: the bombings everywhere she went, by her feet, by her…
translation.es: dónde explotaban las bombas por donde iba, a los pies, a…

translation.en: she was going to protect her child.
translation.es: ella iba a proteger a su hija.

translation.en: That no matter what you do sometimes,
translation.es: A veces, no importa lo que hagas.

translation.en: you can't always… get it right.
You just can't.
In this scene right there, she sighed relief.
translation.es: En esta escena, suspira de alivio.

translation.en: She believed with all her heart
that nothing would happen to her in the church.
translation.es: que no les pasará nada en la iglesia.

translation.en: Devastating.
I find that excruciatingly painful.
Actually excruciating.
Parents can't protect kids every single minute.
translation.es: Los padres no pueden proteger a sus hijos a cada instante.

translation.en: I mean, you try.
You live every moment to protect them.
But what does it take?
Alfred was the first born, in 1960.
translation.es: Alfred fue el primero, nació en 1960.

translation.en: Glenn, 1962.
Regina, 1963.
Dominic, 1964.
I knew I had to be strong.
translation.es: Sabía que tenía que ser fuerte.

translation.en: I knew I had to be very strong.
With those three boys?
Regina was an angel.
I always felt that she was the gift for me…
translation.es: Siempre la consideré el regalo para mí

translation.en: to do what I had to do.
I was destroyed when Alfred told me he had cancer.
translation.es: Cuando Alfred me dijo que tenía cáncer, me destruyó.

translation.en: Fourth stage Hodgkin's disease.
translation.es: Etapa cuatro de la enfermedad de Hodgkin.

translation.en: He said, "I have six months to live, Mom."
translation.es: Dijo: "Me quedan seis meses de vida, mamá".

translation.en: But with the savage beating of chemotherapy, he did make it.
translation.es: Pero soportó la paliza salvaje de la quimioterapia y sobrevivió.

translation.en: And Glenn,
he had an early experience that he didn't tell anybody.
translation.es: tuvo una experiencia de pequeño que no le contó a nadie.

translation.en: I never had them sleep out.
I asked if they wanted their friends, they could sleep here by me.
translation.es: Les dejaba invitar a sus amigos y que durmieran a mi lado.

translation.en: They had overnights.
But no, no. This one time…
translation.es: Pero no, esta vez en particular…

translation.en: they asked me right at this swim meet, "Can your son sleep over?"
translation.es: me preguntaron en una reunión de natación: "¿Tu hijo puede venir a dormir a casa?".

translation.en: The uncle,
a boxing champion, they looked up to him.
translation.es: que era campeón de boxeo, lo admiraban.

translation.en: And he was abusive.
He was told, "If you tell your parents anything,
translation.es: Le dijo: "Si les dices algo a tus padres,

translation.en: we're gonna kill them."
I didn't know anything till he was 18.
translation.es: No lo supe hasta que cumplió 18 años.

translation.en: When she sees them, what they're doing to her daughter,
translation.es: Cuando ella los ve, cuando ve lo que le hacen a su hija,

translation.en: she can't do anything about it.
And then, of course, the mother's destroyed.
translation.es: Por supuesto, la madre queda destruida.

translation.en: And the fact that the mother actually gets up.
translation.es: Y el hecho de que la madre se levanta…

translation.en: Gets up instead of just dying.
translation.es: se levanta en vez de morir…

translation.en: That's courage. That's strength.
That's a power that you pull that you don't even have.
translation.es: un poder que sacas que ni siquiera tienes.

translation.en: You create that power right out of your gut.
translation.es: Una crea ese poder desde su instinto.

translation.en: And that's what she conveys in this scene.
translation.es: Y eso es lo que transmite en esta escena.

translation.en: No matter what, you have to go forward.
translation.es: Pase lo que pase, tienes que seguir adelante.

translation.en: [Edoardo in English] Cut! Perfect. Moving on.
[in Italian] Bravo, Mama!
[in English] Perfect. Perfect. That's it. That's it.
[in Italian] That look was just right.
Absolutely.
[Loren in English] You're always trying to find an answer.
Sometimes there is no answer.
What really counts is your truth, your belief in life.
translation.es: Lo que cuenta es tu verdad, tu creencia en la vida.

translation.en: In people.
In children, in your son, in everybody, you know.
translation.es: en los niños, en tu hijo, en todos.

translation.en: [Edoardo] Mama, you're beautiful.
I'm seeing you right here. Stunning.
[Nancy] She wanted, more than anything in the world, to be a mother.
translation.es: Lo que más quería en el mundo era ser madre.

translation.en: My journey was a tough one.
But I think her journey was a tough one too,
translation.es: pero creo que la suya también lo fue porque,

translation.en: because even though-- look, she got an Oscar and this and that,
translation.es: aunque ganó un Oscar y otras cosas,

translation.en: when she wanted to have the babies, she had to stay in bed.
translation.es: cuando quería tener bebés, tuvo que quedarse en la cama.

translation.en: [man] What was the point of the actual staying in bed for eight months?
translation.es: Por qué debías quedarte en cama durante ocho meses?

translation.en: Well, because, uh…
if I didn't, I was going to lose my babies.
translation.es: si no lo hacía, iba a perder a mis bebés.

translation.en: [Nancy] She wanted those kids, and she made it happen.
translation.es: Quería a esos bebés y lo logró.

translation.en: She never gave up.
[Sophia] I worked very hard to have two children.
translation.es: Trabajé mucho para tener dos hijos.

translation.en: I worked very hard to have a husband.
translation.es: Y trabajé mucho para tener un esposo.

translation.en: I worked very hard for whatever I had.
translation.es: Trabajé mucho para lo que tenía.

translation.en: [Nancy] So this is Marriage Italian Style.
translation.es: Esto es Matrimonio a la italiana.

translation.en: [Nancy in English] Well, here she is.
Absolutely delighted that she persevered
translation.es: Absolutamente encantada de que haya perseverado

translation.en: and reached exactly what she wanted to do.
translation.es: y logrado exactamente lo que quería.

translation.en: Making herself very legitimate.
[Sophia] I thought I had a great complex because my father never married my mother.
translation.es: Creía que tenía un gran complejo porque mi padre no se había casado con mi madre.

translation.en: And that's why I needed legality. I needed children. I needed a family of my own.
translation.es: Por eso yo necesitaba la legalidad, hijos y una familia propia.

translation.en: [Nancy] Carlo Ponti was already a very successful producer
translation.es: Carlo Ponti ya era un productor muy exitoso

translation.en: when he met Sophia.
He helped her become a movie star, and then, of course, later on,
translation.es: La ayudó a ser una estrella de cine y, por supuesto, eso se convirtió en un romance.

translation.en: it became a romance.
translation.es: y, por supuesto, eso se convirtió en un romance.

translation.en: When a guy helps you be who you wanna be and who you are,
translation.es: Cuando un hombre te ayuda a ser quien quieres ser, quien eres,

translation.en: they become very sexy.
And do you know, she could have married Cary Grant.
translation.es: Ella pudo haberse casado con Cary Grant.

translation.en: Now, when they made their second film together, Houseboat,
translation.es: Cuando hicieron su segunda película juntos, Casa flotante, él dijo: "Casémonos".

translation.en: he said, "Let's get married."
[Sophia] He was truly very much in love with me.
But when the moment came,
that I had to decide, that I had to choose,
I chose for Carlo because I thought,
translation.es: y elegí a Carlo porque pensé

translation.en: he belonged to my world, to my people.
translation.es: que pertenecía a mi mundo, a mi gente.

translation.en: And to marry somebody that was not Italian,
translation.es: Si me casaba con alguien que no era italiano,

translation.en: that was not of my hometown,
I would have felt completely lost.
[Nancy] And so she made the decision.
"I'm gonna marry the person who knows me and adores me.
translation.es: "Me casaré con la persona que me conoce y me adora

translation.en: And we will make a life together through thick and thin."
translation.es: y tendremos una vida juntos, en las buenas y en las malas".

translation.en: -Okay. -One type of drops or more than one?
translation.es: - Bien. - ¿Un tipo de gotas o más?

translation.en: You're getting several.
-[man] Oh. Drop away. -[Nancy] I have to shake it.
Now, just lean back a little now.
Okay. Okay.
Alan and I…
went to high school together.
Alan was voted best-looking and best athlete.
translation.es: A Alan lo votaron como el mejor atleta y el más apuesto.

translation.en: I was voted most popular girl.
translation.es: A mí, como la chica más popular.

translation.en: He said he knew exactly who I was
translation.es: Me dijo que sabía perfectamente quién era yo

translation.en: and that he thought, "One day, she'll be my girl."
translation.es: y pensaba que, algún día, yo sería su chica.

translation.en: I said, "How could you think that?"
translation.es: Le pregunté por qué pensaría eso.

translation.en: He said, "Easy.
I knew that if I married you, I would never have a bad day."
translation.es: Sabía que, si me casaba contigo, nunca tendría un mal día".

translation.en: And I said, "Are you serious?" He said, "Oh, yeah. And it's true.
translation.es: Le pregunté si hablaba en serio y dijo: "Claro. Y es verdad.

translation.en: I've never had a bad day married to you."
translation.es: Nunca he tenido un mal día mientras he estado casado contigo".

translation.en: -Yeah. -You really are cute, Alan.
I'll tell you something, and this is hilarious.
translation.es: Te diré algo. Esto es gracioso.

translation.en: I was married with two children,
translation.es: Estaba casado y tenía dos hijos.

translation.en: and we were fortunate enough to have a babysitter one of the nights.
translation.es: Fuimos afortunados de tener una niñera una noche.

translation.en: And-- and-- and that's when I saw
Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow.
I was a little-waisted girl, like this.
Not wasted, as in drunk. I mean my waist, my shape.
translation.es: No hablo de mi estatura, sino de que tenía una cintura pequeña.

translation.en: [laughs] And I wanted to imitate Sophia Loren.
translation.es: Y quería imitar a Sophia Loren.

translation.en: I thought, "We have to keep fun in this marriage. We can't be too serious.
translation.es: Pensé que había que ponerle diversión al matrimonio, que no fuera tan serio.

translation.en: When he comes home,
I am gonna have this garter belt on,
à la Sophia Loren."
So I put a bathrobe on and nothing else on.
translation.es: Así que me puse solo una bata.

translation.en: And Alan came home. [chuckles]
He said, "Okay, hon. The kids are asleep. Are we gonna go to bed?"
translation.es: Dijo: "Cielo, los niños se durmieron. ¿Vamos a dormir?".

translation.en: I said, "Al!"
Goes fast. I can't believe 60 years have passed so fast.
translation.es: No puedo creer que hayan pasado 60 años tan rápido.

translation.en: -[Nancy] I know. It's hard to believe. -It is.
I know you always told me you loved my brains.
translation.es: Siempre me dijiste que amabas mis sesos.

translation.en: [Alan] I thought you were gonna say something else.
translation.es: Pensé que ibas a decir otra cosa.

translation.en: -I heard that "B." -[laughs]
Well, I knew that you loved my brains,
translation.es: Bueno, sabía que amabas mis sesos

translation.en: -and I know that you loved my figure. -Mm-hmm.
[Nancy] What else did you really always--
-Really. No, really. What did you really-- -No.
[Nancy] 'Cause there were so many girls that really were crazy about you.
translation.es: Porque había muchas chicas locas por ti.

translation.en: What I really liked
is how you could handle every little situation that came up.
translation.es: cómo manejas cada pequeña situación que surge.

translation.en: How you address every challenge. It's very intense.
translation.es: Cómo abordas cada desafío. Es muy intenso.

translation.en: You don't ease up on anything. Very intense.
translation.es: No te relajas con nada. Eres muy intensa.

translation.en: And yes, you do show passion and emotions on a lot of things.
translation.es: Y, sí, muestras pasión y sentimiento en muchas cosas.

translation.en: [man] Did anyone like Cary Grant ever sweep you off your feet?
translation.es: ¿Alguien como Cary Grant te ha flechado?

translation.en: That's a really good question.
Once.
Yeah.
Yeah, and I had to hold myself in definite demeanor
translation.es: Sí, y tuve que contenerme estoicamente

translation.en: because I was already married.
I was the one at the pool with the kids.
translation.es: Estaba en la piscina con los niños.

translation.en: I knew it would go nowhere. Nowhere at all.
translation.es: Sabía que no llegaría a nada, a ningún lado.

translation.en: My husband knew enough that
his wife was very often liked very much.
translation.es: que, muchas veces, otros se fijaban en su esposa.

translation.en: And-- but he also knew I always knew my place.
translation.es: Pero también, que yo sabía cuál era mi lugar.

translation.en: And I'm not sorry.
You know, you make these decisions.
translation.es: Una toma este tipo de decisiones.

translation.en: But I would like to think that every woman has had more than one experience where,
translation.es: Y quisiera pensar que cada mujer ha tenido más de una experiencia en la que alguien la hizo sentir muy especial.

translation.en: you know, someone made them feel very special.
translation.es: en la que alguien la hizo sentir muy especial.

translation.en: You know.
The difference is, what do you do about it?
translation.es: La cuestión es qué hacer ante eso.

translation.en: -[men and women clamoring] -[bell tolling]
translation.es: CARLO PONTI, PRODUCTOR DE CINE, MUERE A LOS 94 AÑOS

translation.en: [Sophia] It's very…
…uh, very difficult.
You try to forget about it,
but then the torment that you have inside comes back again.
translation.es: pero el tormento que sientes por dentro vuelve de nuevo.

translation.en: What can I do? And then I start to think positively.
translation.es: ¿Qué puedo hacer? Y luego, empiezo a pensar positivamente.

translation.en: I tell the story of my life to myself.
translation.es: Recuerdo la historia de mi vida.

translation.en: Say, "You were born in a very poor neighborhood
translation.es: Digo: "Naciste en un barrio muy pobre,

translation.en: during the war,
and you made it.
And you didn't know that you were going to make it."
And then I see my children, my family.
translation.es: Luego veo a mis hijos, a mi familia,

translation.en: And then I feel a little better.
translation.es: y me siento un poco mejor.

translation.en: Life is not easy. It's hard.
translation.es: La vida no es fácil. Es difícil.

translation.en: Think about it. Yeah.
[Nancy] How many things have we all had in our lifetime…
translation.es: ¿Cuántas cosas han pasado en nuestra vida

translation.en: that happened beyond our control?
And what do we do with that?
My son Dominic, he loved the ocean.
translation.es: A mi hijo Dominic le encantaba el mar.

translation.en: Waves. Surfing.
His friends said, "Dom, come with us to Puerto Rico,
translation.es: Sus amigos le dijeron: "Ven con nosotros a Puerto Rico.

translation.en: and let's surf."
He broke his ribs.
What no one picked up is that his artery was severed.
translation.es: Lo que nadie detectó fue que tenía la arteria cortada.

translation.en: It took him three days before his heart gave out.
translation.es: A los tres días, su corazón cedió.

translation.en: I still…
I don't think it's real yet.
My God, I miss his hugs, his kisses, his light.
translation.es: Por Dios, extraño sus abrazos, sus besos, su luz.

translation.en: He could light up a room. You didn't need electricity.
translation.es: Él iluminaba el lugar. No necesitabas electricidad.

translation.en: His love…
And yet…
I spent a lot of my time thinking
that I could fix anything.
And that backfired. Because how can you fix everything?
translation.es: Y eso salió mal. ¿Cómo puedes arreglar todo?

translation.en: I thought I did.
Well, had four kids.
It's like, you study for an exam, you're gonna get an A.
translation.es: Si estudias para un examen, te sacas una calificación alta.

translation.en: You know, you take care of your family, devote yourself.
translation.es: Cuidas a tu familia, te dedicas a ella.

translation.en: Well, it doesn't always turn out the way one expects.
translation.es: Bueno, no siempre resulta todo como uno espera.

translation.en: Alan couldn't handle it.
It was hard for me, but I swallowed a lot
translation.es: Fue difícil para mí, pero aguanté mucho

translation.en: because I had a job, a serious job to do.
translation.es: porque tenía una tarea seria para hacer…

translation.en: To show Dominic's boys an example of how you deal
translation.es: mostrarles a los hijos de Dominic cómo se vive

translation.en: with death of a loved one.
translation.es: con la muerte de un ser querido.

translation.en: They had not seen that before.
So, I spent the next three years
translation.es: Así que pasé los siguientes tres años

translation.en: concentrating on them.
-[woman] Happy birthday! -Hi, Dolly!
My favorite people. [kisses]
-There's my girl! -How you doing?
I'm doing all right…
-Everyone has their own life journey. -[chattering]
translation.es: Todos tienen su propia travesía en la vida.

translation.en: -[woman] Aww, life is good. -[Nancy] Yes.
-Happy birthday, all of us. -[man] Whoo!
-[Nancy] I'm 82 and a half already. -[all laughing]
[Nancy] I just lived my journey the best I could do each day.
translation.es: He vivido mi travesía lo mejor posible cada día.

translation.en: We know about the pitfalls,
but one of the joys in life
translation.es: pero una de las alegrías de la vida

translation.en: is about who we meet along the way.
translation.es: son aquellos a quienes encontramos en el camino.

translation.en: [woman] We're going to 6067 Wilshire Boulevard.
We're on our way.
Oh, this is the sweetest thing.
Where is our girl?
[in Italian] Oh, dear! How much I love you!
How are you?
Good.
It feels like we know each other.
We know each other very well.
I really think so.
All the things that you've done, you represent us.
translation.es: Por todas las cosas que has hecho, nos representas.

translation.en: One hundred percent.
I'm so happy to meet you. I'm really happy, truly.
translation.es: Me alegra mucho conocerte. Estoy realmente contenta.

translation.en: [woman in English] Thank you for coming here too. I have grown up…
[Sophia] To find this family…
it was, for me, a kind of, uh… wonderful miracle.
translation.es: fue una especie de milagro maravilloso.

translation.en: [Sophia] She said that their family loved me a lot.
translation.es: Dijo que su familia me quería mucho.

translation.en: That each time the daughter was doing something,
translation.es: Que cada vez que la hija hacía algo,

translation.en: the mother was always say,
"Sophia is there. She's going to help you."
Like I was an image, which at that time,
translation.es: Como si yo fuera una imagen. En ese momento,

translation.en: maybe it was something that she was looking for, -and she couldn't find. -[chattering]
translation.es: tal vez era algo que ella buscaba y no podía encontrar.

translation.en: -[Sophia] It means something to people. -[glasses clink]
translation.es: Es algo que tiene mucho valor.

translation.en: I think it's wonderful.
[Nancy] No one gets everything they want in life.
translation.es: Nadie tiene todo lo que quiere en la vida.

translation.en: No one does.
But we all get enough to feel
translation.es: Pero todos tenemos lo suficiente para sentir

translation.en: that our lives are important.
-I get good advice from Sophia. -[Sophia] I'm a good teacher.
translation.es: - Sophia me da buenos consejos. - Soy buena maestra.

translation.en: You're a very good teacher.
-I come in whenever it's necessary. -That's right.
translation.es: Entro cuando sea necesario. Así es.

translation.en: Don't you love it?
